recipe.title: Chopped Vegetable Salad
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups watercress, tough stems removed, leaves cut into small pieces
1 cup diced celery (or heart of fennel)
3 oz string beans, trimmed and steamed
Half a small avocado, peeled and cubed
instructions: Combine watercress, parsley, celery, onion, tomatoes, radishes, beans, avocado, and capers in a large bowl. In a small bowl, whisk together lemon, orange and lime juices, sugar, and oil. Stir in mint. Salt and pepper to taste. Toss with salad greens
